en.name: Olivier F.
en.title: Full Stack TS Developer 🇫🇷
en.about: Pandemic career shift: 🎵+Music → 💻+Code. Problem-solver who completed 🚀+Le+Réacteur bootcamp and joined the 🥷+Ninja+Partners team where they trusted me for their ☁️+AWS+development. . Recent work includes 📱+Telegram+Crypto+Mining+App. 🇹🇭+Thailand/🇫🇷+France-based developer specializing in ⚛️+React, +Next.js, REST+APIs, and ⛁+databases. See my stack or Questions 👇🏼
en.database: SQL -> D1 Cloudflare, NoSQL -> Dynamo, MongoDb,
en.environment: AWS -> Cognito , IAM , Amplify, DynamoDb; Cloudflare Worker
en.additional_info:
- Led migration from REST to GraphQL, reducing API calls by 60%
- Architected serverless solution on AWS, reducing costs by 30%
- Implemented CI/CD pipeline, improving deployment frequency from weekly to daily
- Delivered features that increased user engagement by X%
- Optimized database queries reducing response time from Xms to Yms
- Built responsive components used across 15+ pages
- Cross-functional collaboration: Worked closely with designers and product managers
- Problem-solving: Successfully debugged complex race conditions in distributed systems
- Communication: Documented APIs used by 5+ frontend developers
